title: TreasuryDAO Signer Rotation - Motion
body:
It is hereby motioned to replace the current lead signer of the TreasuryDAO Funding subDAO & member of the TreasuryDAO `0x021c1a1cE318E7B4545f6280b248062592B71706` with the new member & future lead signer `0x524269E900ca6ebe2FC57d719995c8D167F8b260` due to emerging time constraints on the side of the current lead signer.

`0x524269E900ca6ebe2FC57d719995c8D167F8b260` is a part of the mStable Core Contributors, and has additional capacity available to provide the TreasuryDAO with their services outside their day-to-day workload.

**Should this motion be brought forward and shared as a public proposal on the mStable forum and Snapshot page?**
author: 0x908DB31Ce01DC42c8B712f9156E969bc65023119
